name: temml
description: TeX to MathML conversion in JavaScript.

scripts.test: yarn lint && node test/buildTests.js && yarn unit-test
scripts.minify: terser test/temml.js -o site/temml/temml.min.js -c -m && terser contrib/mhchem/mhchem.js -o site/temml/mhchem.min.js -c -m
scripts.dist: yarn build && node copyfiles.js && terser contrib/auto-render/test/auto-render.js -o contrib/auto-render/dist/auto-render.min.js -c -m
